raw_body: PIETERSZ,​ CELESTE BONAVENTURE LAWRENCE – (Retired Chief Engineer) – Loving son of late Canute and Muriel Pietersz,​ beloved husband of Jayarani,​ precious father of Delani and Mayroni,​ father-in-law of Dhilan Mitchell and Dilanjan Jayasekera,​ loving grandfather of Danek and Aria,​ passed away peacefully. Remains lie at A.F. Raymond’s Funeral Parlour from 9.30 a.m. on 28th July 2023. Cortege leaves Parlour at 4 p.m. on 29th July 2023 for burial at General Cemetery,​ Kanatte at 4.30 p.m.046882
